entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 51 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
